thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel with a good bar and views
thread.title_full: Nice hotel with a good bar and views - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: annetho
title: Nice hotel with a good bar and views
text:
We only stayed one night but we enjoyed it. Front desk service is excellent. The room was not very large but it was well equipped. Courtyard is probably fine when on a strict budget but this one is nice when you are able to treat yourself a little.
Some rooms have nice views. Lovely bar and dining room. In house starbucks so no bad in-room coffee issues.I don't understand the glass bathroom door and a room with 2 King beds option would be nice. btw: There are no other restaurants or shopping in walking distance. You have to pay for parking and internet but we got those fees waived because we are marriot members (free).
Room Tip: If you can afford it, pay the extra 20 dollars for a room with a view. It was worth it. See more room tips
